item.title: Raster resampling in R
item.author: csaybar@gmail.com (Cesar Aybar)
item.description: 1. Intro A typical workflow for earth analysts always will have to do with several spatial data sources (e.g. Sentinel, MODIS and Landsat) each one with a particular extent and pixel resolution. Resampling is the technique used to homogenize these spatial attributes. Image obtained from here This post demonstrate how easy and incredibly fast is resampling gridded data in R using the raster and gdalUtils packages.
